Description: Velocity controller P gain.The default value is calculated on the basis of themotor parameters.In the case of switching between the two controlloop parameter sets, the values are changedlinearly over the time defined in the parameterCTRL_ParChgTime.In increments of 0.0001 A/RPM.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3012:1hModbus 4610Profibus 4610CIP 118.1.1ModbusTCP 4610EtherCAT 3012:1hPROFINET 4610

Description: Velocity controller integral action time.The default value is calculated.In the case of switching between the two controlloop parameter sets, the values are changedlinearly over the time defined in the parameterCTRL_ParChgTime.In increments of 0.01 ms.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3012:2hModbus 4612Profibus 4612CIP 118.1.2ModbusTCP 4612EtherCAT 3012:2hPROFINET 4612
